import React from 'react' import './Card.scss' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Card = ({item}) => { if (!item) { return null; // adding a null value to the return statement will prevent the component from rendering } return (
{item?.attributes.isNew && New season}

{item?.attributes.title}

${item.oldPrice}

${item?.attributes?.price}

) } export default Card
